quest.name: Raiders of the Lost Pork
journal:
Uin Nee is concerned for the well-being of Il Mheg's most beloved species.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search for the suspicious character at Timh Gyeus.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Forename, help! Il Mheg is being invaded!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Sort of. By “invaded,” I mean, a stranger has shown up and started chasing our porxies!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I wouldn't mind so much if it weren't for the fact our pets are supposed to be gathering flower seeds for use in dreams. Go and put a stop to this silliness, would you?

dialogue.name: TALLFUATH
dialogue.text: One, two! One, two, three, four!

dialogue.name: TALLFUATH
dialogue.text:
On an epic adventure, the intrepid hero is here!♪
A Fuath to be reckoned with, evildoers frozen in fear!♪
In the name of joy, he dances his merry jig!♪
Let none keep him from the enchanted flying pig!♪

dialogue.name: TALLFUATH
dialogue.text: Oh, porxie, how do I love thee? Let me count the ways! But why must you always flee when I draw near? Why, I ask youuu!

dialogue.name: TALLFUATH
dialogue.text: The mere thought I could be causing them distress has left me quite flabbergasted! And to think they would spurn my affections...it is preposterous, I tell you!

dialogue.name: TALLFUATH
dialogue.text: I was merely passing through to trade with the Nu Mou when I saw their precious pink companions. That adorable snout, that curly tail... It was love at first sight! Wait for me, porxies!

dialogue.name: SCAVENGER
dialogue.text: No more, please! I'll leave Il Mheg and never come back, I swear!

dialogue.name: SCAVENGER
dialogue.text: Oh, you're not a faerie? Thank goodness.

dialogue.name: SCAVENGER
dialogue.text: I was trying to catch one of those little flying pigs, for research purposes. But then I discovered that they're the faeries' creations. Even if I managed to get my hands on them, I'd never be able to take something so dangerous back to civilization!

dialogue.name: SCAVENGER
dialogue.text: And if the pixies find me, they'll turn me into one of those leafmen! It's high time I quit this godsforsaken place!

dialogue.name: FAKEMYSTEL
dialogue.text: Hello! I am a very rich lady from Eulmore! I expect you to curtsybow when greeting one of my standing!

dialogue.name: FAKEMYSTEL
dialogue.text: Ha ha! Just joking! I'm actually a pixie in disguise. Walking around like a mortal certainly makes a change from all that flitting about!

dialogue.name: FAKEMYSTEL
dialogue.text: Chasing porxies? Why, yes, as a matter of fact, I was. It's a bit hard to keep up with them, though. Perhaps I need some more practice with this “one foot in front of the other” business!

dialogue.name: FAKEMYSTEL
dialogue.text: And if the other pixies have a problem with me chasing those flappy-eared porkers, I could leave them alone, I suppose. After all, 'tis hardly fitting for a “lady” to engage in such unseemly behavior!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: So I take it the porxies will be resuming their duties? Good. I won't let them shirk their responsibilities! Not even if they're cute and adorable and I want to squeeze them and squeeze them until... Gah!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: No! I mustn't allow them to beguile me! I have a job to do! And for your part in...whatever this was, I'm making you an honorary “Protector of Porxies”!
